short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension pre-selects default options to search

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Websense Portal Enhanced Quarantined mails management
Features:
- Automatically set Search Query to Quarantined, 7 days, 200 results per page. (Though it may not display so on the page)
- Continuous Search interval can be seen on Title (top left) and Badge (Icon at top right of browser) and configured
- Ability to delete all SPAMS, VIRUSES, THREAT SEEKERS, RELEASED with one button
- Selection by text matching filtering in FROM, TO, SUBJECT, ISSUE fields.

PS: Websense may reset connection at 8PM EST, thus, the page needs to be manually refreshed and relogin - for now.

Version 1.2.5
- Removed auto sign-in feature.

Version 1.1.9:
- Keyword "Lexical" added to CheckAll.
